title: Simple tortilla pizzas
description: These tasty tortilla pizza bites are just the trick for an easy cheat’s pizza.Each pizza provides 371 kcal, 18.5g protein, 42g carbohydrate (of which 8g sugars), 14g fat (of which 7.5g saturates), 4g fibre and 1.4g salt.
ingredients: 4 wholewheat, plain flour or corn tortillas (about 19cm/7½in diameter)
125g/4½oz pecorino cheese (or a mature cheddar), coarsely grated
280g jar roasted red and yellow peppers, drained (about 175g/6oz of actual peppers)
flaked sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
